perturbation.original_text: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the “Purpose”) will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service.
perturbation.changed_text: The purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be determined by the Managers on a quarterly basis.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specified purpose and giving the Managers the power to decide quarterly, it creates uncertainty and goes against the original intent, especially concerning required capital contributions tied to the original purpose.

perturbation.original_text:
Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the “Capital Contribution”):

Member
Contribution Description
Agreed Value
BorrowMoney.com, inc
1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Including
specified Description of duty*
$3,500,000.00 USD
JVLS, LLC dba
Vaccines 2Go
$60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State,
And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any
Generated Gross Revenue, In Addition to The Total
Contributions.
$3,500,000.00 USD
perturbation.changed_text: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture as agreed upon. Details of these contributions are maintained separately and are subject to periodic review.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific descriptions of the Capital Contributions, including the value of the leased office space and the funding commitments from JVLS, the agreement creates a contradiction. Later sections still reference 'Capital Contributions,' but their actual definition is obfuscated. This introduces ambiguity in calculating the value of interest and distributions.

perturbation.original_text: Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote carrying equal weight.
perturbation.changed_text: Any vote required by the Members will be conducted as deemed appropriate by the managers.
perturbation.explanation: By removing that each member has equal voting power, it create an internal contradiction as to how decisions are made and enforced. The initial agreement set up equality but is now removed.
